mapper.sql: mw.id, mw.nickname, mw.sex, mw.province, mw.city, mw.country, mw.headimgurl, mw.privilegeStr, mw.unionid, mw.openid, mw.createBy, mw.createTime, mw.updateBy, mw.updateTime, mw.version, mw.isDeleted, mw.userID, mw.refreshToken, mw.accessToken, mw.refreshTokenTime, mw.accessTokenTime, mw.ticket, mw.ticketTime

where 1=1 and mw.id = #{condition.id} and mw.nickname = #{condition.nickname} and mw.sex = #{condition.sex} and mw.province = #{condition.province} and mw.city = #{condition.city} and mw.country = #{condition.country} and mw.headimgurl = #{condition.headimgurl} and mw.privilegeStr = #{condition.privilegeStr} and mw.unionid = #{condition.unionid} and mw.openid = #{condition.openid} and mw.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and mw.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and mw.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and mw.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and mw.version = #{condition.version} and mw.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and mw.userID = #{condition.userID} and mw.refreshToken = #{condition.refreshToken} and mw.accessToken = #{condition.accessToken} and mw.refreshTokenTime = #{condition.refreshTokenTime} and mw.accessTokenTime = #{condition.accessTokenTime} and mw.ticket = #{condition.ticket} and mw.ticketTime = #{condition.ticketTime}

where 1=1 and mw.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(mw.nickname) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.nickname}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.sex) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sex}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.province) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.province}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.city) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.city}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.country) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.country}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.headimgurl) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.headimgurl}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.privilegeStr) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.privilegeStr}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.unionid) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.unionid}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.openid) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.openid}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.refreshToken) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refreshToken}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.accessToken) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.accessToken}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.refreshTokenTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refreshTokenTime}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.accessTokenTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.accessTokenTime}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.ticket) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.ticket}),'%')) and UPPER(mw.ticketTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.ticketTime}),'%'))
mapper.update: update mini_weixin set nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, country=#{country}, headimgurl=#{headimgurl}, privilegeStr=#{privilegeStr}, unionid=#{unionid}, openid=#{openid}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, userID=#{userID}, refreshToken=#{refreshToken}, accessToken=#{accessToken}, refreshTokenTime=#{refreshTokenTime}, accessTokenTime=#{accessTokenTime}, ticket=#{ticket}, ticketTime=#{ticketTime}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from mini_weixin mw where mw.id = #{id} and mw.isDeleted = false
